changes.description: Edit widget button only appears when required
Selecting a widget displays its properties in the widget editor side bar if it is open
Selected widget highlight is removed when template is changed
Included code in overview page to prevent page from caching so that people are always downloading the latest version
Remove refresh page button from menu - could lead to confusion
Changed http://oxygen.geowise.co.uk/ia-designer/ to http://oxygen/ia-designer/ to allow internal access
